languages.text: "Для исполнения кровного долга, {name}. Каковы бы ни были ваши обязанности ранее, ныне они считаются утратившими свое значение. Приказом Лорд-капитана вы реквизированы для служения Вольному Торговцу в угодных Богу-Императору деяниях".

traits.locale_text: "Для исполнения кровного долга, {name}. Каковы бы не были ваши обязанности ранее, ныне они считаются утратившими свое значение. Приказом Лорд-капитана вы реквизированы для служения Вольному Торговцу в угодных Богу-Императору деяниях".

languages.text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Для исполнения кровного долга, {name}. Каковы бы ни были ваши обязанности ранее, ныне они считаются утратившими свое значение. Приказом Лорд-капитана вы реквизированы для служения Вольному Торговцу в угодных Богу-Императору деяниях".

traits.locale_text: "So that you could fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever responsibilities you had before, they are hereby moot. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

"So that you could fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever responsibilities you had before, they are hereby moot. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

"So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

"So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

"So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

languages.text: “这样您就可以履行您的血缘职责了，{name}。无论您之前有着怎样的职责，那些职责今后都与您无关了。根据舰长大人的命令，您已经被征用到了这艘船上，为行商浪人效力，从事获得神皇赐福的宏伟大业。”
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “这样您就可以履行您的血缘职责了，{name}。无论您之前有着怎样的职责，那些职责今后都与您无关了。根据舰长大人的命令，您已经被征用到了这艘船上，为行商浪人效力，从事获得神皇赐福的宏伟大业。”

languages.text: «Para que pueda cumplir con su deber sanguíneo, {name}. Todas las obligaciones que tuviera antes de este momento quedan anuladas. Por orden de la Lord Capitán, queda transferid{mf|o|a} al servicio de la Comerciante Independiente para asistirla en sus deberes benditos por el Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Para que pueda cumplir con su deber sanguíneo, {name}. Todas las obligaciones que tuviera antes de este momento quedan anuladas. Por orden de la Lord Capitán, queda transferid{mf|o|a} al servicio de la Comerciante Independiente para asistirla en sus deberes benditos por el Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「血統の義務を果たすためです、{name}さん。以前どんな義務を負っていたとしても、今後は無効です。ロード・キャプテンの命令により、あなたは神帝陛下に祝福された行為で自由開拓者に仕えるよう徴用されたのです」
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「血統の義務を果たすためです、{name}。以前どんな義務を負っていたとしても、今後は無効です。ロード・キャプテンの命令により、あなたは神帝陛下に祝福された行為で自由開拓者に仕えるよう徴用されたのです」
「血統の義務を果たすためです、{name}さん。以前どんな義務を負っていたとしても、今後は無効です。ロード・キャプテンの命令により、あなたは神帝陛下に祝福された行為で自由開拓者に仕えるよう徴用されたのです」

languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, . Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

languages.text: « Afin que vous puissiez assumer la charge de votre lignée, {name}. Quelles que puissent avoir été vos obligations passées, elles sont désormais nulles et non avenues. Par ordre de la seigneure-capitaine, vous avez été {mf|enrôlé|enrôlée} au service de la libre-marchande pour accomplir les saintes visées de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Afin que vous puissiez assumer la charge de votre lignée, {name}. Quelles que puissent avoir été vos obligations passées, elles sont désormais nulles et non avenues. Par ordre de la seigneure-capitaine, vous avez été {mf|enrôlé|enrôlée} au service de la libre-marchande pour accomplir les saintes visées de l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: "Damit Ihr Eure Blutpflicht erfüllen könnt, {name}. Was immer Ihr bislang an Aufgaben hattet, ist ab sofort null und nichtig. Ihr wurdet auf Befehl des Lord Captain eingezogen, um der Freihändlerin bei vom Gottimperator gesegneten Aufgaben zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Damit Ihr Eure Blutpflicht erfüllen könnt, {name}. Was immer Ihr bislang an Aufgaben hattet, ist ab sofort null und nichtig. Ihr wurdet auf Befehl des Lord Captain eingezogen, um der Freihändlerin bei vom Gottimperator gesegneten Aufgaben zu dienen."

languages.text: "Kan vazifenizi yerine getirebilmeniz için {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Daha önce sahip olduğunuz yükümlülükleriniz artık hükümsüz. Lord Kaptan'ın emriyle, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsadığı işlerde Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmek üzere talep edildiniz."
languages.original_text: "So that you may fulfil your blood duty, {name}. Whatever obligations you had before, they are henceforth null and void. By order of the Lord Captain, you have been requisitioned to serve the Rogue Trader in deeds blessed by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Kan vazifenizi yerine getirebilmeniz için. Daha önce sahip olduğunuz yükümlülükleriniz artık hükümsüz. Lord Kaptan'ın emriyle, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsadığı işlerde Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmek üzere talep edildiniz."
